project.name: C-C843A-PSQL-09-ST01-DT05-DF17-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C843A-PSQL-09-ST01-DT05-DF17-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Creates a union that can be either an int or a char *. If input is a non-zero number, set union to that number, else set union to the input string. Try to access the union as a string, regardless of how it is set. Seg fault if the input is a non-zero number.

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C843A-PSQL-09-ST01-DT05-DF17-CF24-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Creates a union that can be either an int or a char *. If input is a non-zero number, set union to that number, else set union to the input string. Try to access the union as a string, regardless of how it is set. Seg fault if the input is a non-zero number.

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.environment_variable: not a number not a number not a number
